hooks.name: format-on-edit
hooks.description: Auto-format code with Prettier after edits

hooks.command: npx prettier --write "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS" 2>/dev/null || echo '⚠️ Prettier not available'

hooks.name: typecheck-on-edit
hooks.description: Run TypeScript type checking after editing TS/TSX files

hooks.command: if [[ "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS" =~ \.(ts|tsx)$ ]]; then npx tsc --noEmit --skipLibCheck "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS" 2>&1 | head -20 || echo '⚠️ TypeScript errors detected - please review'; fi

hooks.name: lint-on-edit
hooks.description: Run ESLint after editing JS/TS files

hooks.command: if [[ "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS" =~ \.(js|jsx|ts|tsx)$ ]]; then npx eslint "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS" --fix 2>/dev/null || echo '⚠️ ESLint warnings present'; fi

hooks.name: security-check
hooks.description: Check for common security issues in code

hooks.command: if grep -q 'eval\|dangerouslySetInnerHTML\|innerHTML' "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS"; then echo '⚠️ SECURITY: Potentially dangerous code detected'; fi
